page.title: 12TRAQUAIR FAIR
page.content: THIS YEAR THE TENTH TRAQUAIR FAIR WILL TAKE PLACE IN THE GROUNDS OF TRAQUAIR HOUSE, THE OLDEST INHABITED HOUSE IN SCOTLAND. FROM SMALL BEGINNINGS THIS FAIR HAS BECOME A LARGE AND COLOURFUL EVENT. IT IS ORGANISED BY THE TRAQUAIR CRAFTWORKERS AND OWNERS OF TRAQUAIR HOUSE AND IS IN THE PROCESS OF BEING REGISTERED AS A CHARITABLE TRUST TO PROMOTE INTEREST IN THE ARTS, CRAFTS, MUSIC AND DRAMA. DONATIONS AND COMPLIMENTARY TICKETS ARE GIVEN TO LOCAL HOMES AND CHARITIES. THE EVENT IS WITHOUT PARALLEL IN THE BORDERS, WHERE CRAFTSMEN GATHER TO DEMONSTRATE AND SELL THEIR WARES, AND FRINGE THEATRE GROUPS, MUSICIANS, PUPPETEERS, MIME ARTISTES AND PERFORMERS OF ALL KINDS PROVIDE A GLORIOUS INFORMAL DEMONSTRATION OF THEIR OWN TALENTS, CREATING A MAGICAL ATMOSPHERE OF A VERY SPECIAL COUNTRY FAIR.
